comment.author: Garrett
comment.text: Everyone is missing the point on the new Clinton sever case. Its not that they found emails, its the fact they were found. Information was on a computer that was not supposed to be. The emails are likely duplicate. They were in the hands of a Congressman who wasn't permitted to be in possession of. Clinton caused/allowed the leak of information.

replies.author: Jade
replies.text: And maybe evidence of a coverup
